search.query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="Usage" | eval h=if(len(h)=0 OR isnull(h),"(SQUASHED)",h) | eval s=if(len(s)=0 OR isnull(s),"(SQUASHED)",s) | eval idx=if(len(idx)=0 OR isnull(idx),"(UNKNOWN)",idx) | bin _time span=1d | search group=$group|s$ | stats sum(b) as b by _time, pool, s, st, h, idx | timechart span=1d sum(b) AS volumeB by idx fixedrange=false | fields - _timediff | foreach * [eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>'/1024/1024/1024, 3)]

| rest /services/data/indexes | rename title as idx | join max=0 idx [| inputlookup customers.csv] | dedup group idx percent_ownership | search group=$group|s$
| eval license_rate = $license_rate$ | eval hot_warm_storage_rate = $hot_warm_storage_rate$ | eval cold_storage_rate = $cold_storage_rate$ | eval "Years Retention" = round(frozenTimePeriodInSecs/31536000,2)
| foreach *MB [ eval <<MATCHSTR>>GB = '<<FIELD>>' / 1024 ]
| eval hot_warm_conf = if('homePath.maxDataSizeGB' == 0, maxTotalDataSizeGB, 'homePath.maxDataSizeGB') | eval hot_warm_storage_cost = hot_warm_conf * hot_warm_storage_rate * percent_ownership / 100
| eval cold_conf = maxTotalDataSizeGB - 'homePath.maxDataSizeGB' | eval cold_conf = if('coldPath.maxDataSizeGB' == 0 AND 'homePath.maxDataSizeGB' = 0, 0, cold_conf) | eval cold_storage_cost = cold_conf * cold_storage_rate * percent_ownership / 100 | eval total_storage_conf_gb = hot_warm_conf + cold_conf
| eval stor_cost = (hot_warm_storage_cost + cold_storage_cost)
| eval lic_cost = max_lic_GB * license_rate * percent_ownership / 100
| addcoltotals lic_cost stor_cost hot_warm_storage_cost cold_storage_cost | eval total_cost = lic_cost+stor_cost | eval unused_lic_GB = max_lic_GB-currentDBSizeGB
| foreach *_cost *_rate *GB cold_conf percent_ownership [ eval <<FIELD>> = round( '<<FIELD>>' , 2 ) ]
| table idx, splunk_server, eai:acl.app, max_lic_GB, license_rate, lic_cost, currentDBSizeGB, unused_lic_GB, homePath_expanded, coldPath_expanded, maxTotalDataSizeGB, totalEventCount, disabled, years_retention, hot_warm_conf, hot_warm_storage_rate, hot_warm_storage_cost, cold_conf, cold_storage_rate, cold_storage_cost, stor_cost, percent_ownership, total_cost, total_storage_conf_gb, group
| sort idx, splunk_server, eai:acl.app, max_lic_GB, license_rate, lic_cost, currentDBSizeGB, unused_lic_GB, homePath_expanded, coldPath_expanded, maxTotalDataSizeGB, totalEventCount, disabled, years_retention, hot_warm_conf, hot_warm_storage_rate, hot_warm_storage_cost, cold_conf, cold_storage_rate, cold_storage_cost, stor_cost, percent_ownership, total_cost, total_storage_conf_gb, group
| rename idx AS Index, splunk_server AS "Splunk Server", max_lic_GB AS "Max Conf GB", license_rate AS "License Rate", lic_cost AS "License Cost", stor_cost AS "Storage Cost", total_cost AS "Total Cost", currentDBSizeGB AS "Current GB Used", maxTotalDataSizeGB AS "Max Storage GB", unused_lic_GB AS "Unused Lic GB", eai:acl.app AS "App ACL", totalEventCount AS "Event Count", disabled AS Disabled, homePath_expanded AS "Hot/Warm Path", coldPath_expanded AS "Cold Path", percent_ownership AS "Percent Ownership", hot_warm_conf AS "Hot/Warm Conf GB", cold_conf AS "Cold Conf GB", hot_warm_storage_rate AS "Hot/Warm Storage Rate", cold_storage_rate AS "Cold Rate", hot_warm_storage_cost AS "Hot/Warm Storage Cost", cold_storage_cost AS "Cold Storage Cost", total_storage_conf_gb AS "Total Storage Conf GB"
index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="Usage" | append [| inputlookup customers.csv] | stats count by group

div.h4: The Chargeback App: How to use.

div.p:
Set Up - This panel contains set up information for the Chargeback app. Note that you will need to download the "File Lookup Editor App" from Splunk apps in order for you to input and edit groups, costs, etc.
You will then need to update the customers.csv file to reflect the departments in your environment. There is a "ChargeBack Configuration Audit" below, which will help you identify anything that is missing.
Column Headers - Do not alter the names of the column headers - group, idx, max_lic_GB
Group - These are the different departments that you are providing Splunk as a service to.
IDX - These are the indexes that you have configured. Match the names exactly.
MAX_LIC_GB - This is the maximum daily data volume in GBs that your customer is going to use. This is used to calculate the total cost to the customer.

chart.title: Click on an index for predictive view.

search.query: table Index, "Splunk Server", "Max Conf GB", "License Rate", "Percent Ownership", "License Cost" | eval "Percent Ownership"='Percent Ownership'+" %" | eval "License Rate"="$currency_symbol$".tostring('License Rate',"commas") | eval "License Cost"="$currency_symbol$".tostring('License Cost',"commas")

table Index, "Splunk Server", "Max Storage GB", "Hot/Warm Conf GB", calc_hot, "Hot/Warm Storage Rate", "Hot/Warm Storage Cost", "Cold Conf GB", "Cold Rate", "Cold Storage Cost", "Percent Ownership", "Storage Cost" | eval "Percent Ownership"='Percent Ownership'+" %" | eval "Hot/Warm Storage Cost"="$currency_symbol$".tostring('Hot/Warm Storage Cost',"commas") | eval "Cold Storage Cost"="$currency_symbol$".tostring('Cold Storage Cost',"commas") | eval "Storage Cost"="$currency_symbol$".tostring('Storage Cost',"commas")

chart.title: Max Conf GB Sum Distribution for $group|s$

search.query: | chart sum("Max Conf GB") AS "Max Conf GB Sum" over Index by group

single.title: Yearly Expense for $group|s$ Based on Limits

table.title: ChargeBack Configuration Audit - Fix these immediately!

search.query: | set diff [| inputlookup customers.csv | dedup idx | fields idx | dedup group idx percent_ownership | search NOT idx=*summary* | rename idx AS "Index defined in customers.csv, but is NOT defined in Splunk"] [| rest /services/data/indexes | search isInternal=0 OR isInternal=0 | search NOT title=*summary* | fields title | rename title AS "Index is NOT defined in customers.csv"]

| rest /services/data/indexes | rename title as idx | join max=0 idx [| inputlookup customers.csv] | dedup group idx percent_ownership | stats sum(percent_ownership) AS "Total Percent Ownership" by idx | eval "Configuration Check" = if ('Total Percent Ownership' > 100 OR 'Total Percent Ownership' < 100, "Percent Ownership Error. It is not 100%!", "OK")

| rest /services/data/indexes | rename title as idx | join max=0 idx [| inputlookup customers.csv] | dedup group idx percent_ownership | rename max_lic_GB AS "Max Conf GB" | stats sum("Max Conf GB") AS "Total Max Conf GB" | appendcols [| REST /services/licenser/licenses/ | fields label type quota expiration_time group_id splunk_server stack_id status updated | search status=VALID type=* | eval "License in GB"=round(quota/1024/1024/1024,0) | addtotals "License in GB" col=true | fields + "License in GB" | sort - "License in GB" | head 1] | eval Alert = if ('Total Max Conf GB' > 'License in GB', "Over Subscription Detected", "None" ) | table "Total Max Conf GB", "License in GB", Alert

table.title: "Hot/Warm", "Cold", or "Total Storage" Conf in GB Is Too Big

search.query: | where ("Max Storage GB" < "Hot/Warm Conf GB") OR ("Max Storage GB" < "Cold Conf GB") OR ('Max Storage GB' > 'Total Storage Conf GB') | table Index, "Hot/Warm Conf GB", "Cold Conf GB", "Total Storage Conf GB", "Max Storage GB"

| REST /services/licenser/licenses/ | fields label type quota expiration_time group_id splunk_server stack_id status updated | eval license_GB=round(quota/1024/1024/1024,0) | eval valid_lic=if(status=="VALID",license_GB,0) | addcoltotals license_GB,valid_lic | rename label AS Label, type AS Type, quota AS Quota, expiration_time AS "Experatin Time", grup_id AS "Group ID", splunk_server AS "Splunk Server", stack_id AS "Stack ID", status AS Status, updated AS Updated, license_GB AS "License in GB", valid_lic AS "Valid License"
table Index, "Splunk Server", "App ACL", "Event Count", "Max Conf GB", "License Rate", "Percent Ownership", "License Cost", Disabled

table Index, "Splunk Server", "Years Retention", "Current GB Used", "Unused Lic GB", "Max Storage GB", "Percent Ownership", "Hot/Warm Max Data Size GB", "Hot/Warm Conf GB", "Hot/Warm Rate", "Hot/Warm Storage Cost", "Max Storage GB", "Hot/Warm Max Data Size GB", "Cold Max Data Size GB", "Cold Conf GB", "Cold Storage Rate", "Cold Storage Cost", "Storage Cost", "Total Cost"
